control
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  control.Controller

public class Controller
extends Object

Controller is a static singleton that provides the views with the model and updates the model based on the users interactions with the view

Author:
J-Tesseract

public static void addAlarm(int alarmDay,
                            int alarmHour,
                            int alarmMin,
                            int alarmFrequency,
                            Context sendingContext)
addAlarm Add an alarm on the selected Album

Parameters:
alarmDay - The first day to start the alarm
alarmHour - The first hour to start the alarm
alarmMin - The first min to start the alarm
alarmFrequency - The frequency of the alarms repetition
sendingContext - The context to generate the alarm with

Parameters:
alarmContext - The Album context the alarm was created in

getInitialDelaySeconds

private static int getInitialDelaySeconds(int day,
                                          int hour,
                                          int min)
getInitialDelaySeconds Calculate the number of seconds to delay from the current time to initial notification

Parameters:
day - The first day of the week to start the notification
hour - The first hour of the day to start the notification
min - The first min of the hour to start the notification
Returns:
delaySeconds The number of seconds to delay before starting the notification

getRepeatedDelaySeconds

private static int getRepeatedDelaySeconds(int alarmFrequencyCode)
getRepeatedDelaySeconds Convert the week, day, or hour into seconds

Parameters:
alarmFrequencyCode - The code indicating which alarm frequency was chosen. 0=WEEK, 1=DAY, 2=HOUR;
Returns:
delaySeconds The number of seconds to delay before repetition

                            Uri imageUri,
                            String comment)
addPhoto Add a Photo with Uri imageUri and String comment to the album at albumIndex

Parameters:
albumIndex - The index of the album to add the Photo to
imageUri - The Uri the Bitmap of the Photo is stored at
comment - The comment of the Photo

                               int photoIndex)
deletePhoto Delete photo at photoIndex from album at albumIndex

Parameters:
albumIndex - The Album index from which to delete the photo
photoIndex - The Photo index to be deleted

                               int photoIndex,
                               String newComment)
updatePhoto Update the indicated Photo with a new comment

Parameters:
albumIndex - The index of the album holding the Photo to update
photoIndex - The index of the Photo to update
newComment - The new comment to add to the Photo

checkAlbumNames

public static int checkAlbumNames(String nameToCheck)
checkAlbumNames Given a name, returns the albumIndex that represents the Album with that name or returns -1 if no album exists.

Parameters:
nameToCheck - The name of the album to check
Returns:
index of album if exists, else returns -1

inTags

public static boolean inTags(String tagToCheck)
inTags Given a tag to check, determines if it is one of the given tags

Parameters:
tagToCheck - The tag to check
Returns:
inTag True if the tag is known. False if the tag is not known.

setTags

public static void setTags()
setTags Initialize the Controller with the known tags

findPhotos

public static ArrayList<SearchItem> findPhotos(String tagToFind)
findPhotos given a tag to find, searches through all Photos and takes the Uris of the Photos that have that tag. The Uris and their corresponding Album and Photo indices are placed in a SearchItem and added to the returned ArrayList

Parameters:
tagToFind - The tag to find
Returns:
tagged The ArrayList with matching tags
